@Dastan1 wrote:

this is a code for player vs player. ( pvp ) , you probably changed that and tryed on npc.

search till you find special attack for npc’s. and change there and try it on npc

item.title: [HELP] Need Help Editing Special Attack Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @Stijn12 Stijn12
item.description:
@Stijn12 wrote:

Hello people,
I have a 317[Delta] server
I have a vls in my server but the special attack is like the one of barrelchest anchor.
This is the code:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13644 && specialAmount > 24){
setAnimation(1872);
specialAmount -= 24;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee);
getHit(30);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(480);
hitDiff = misc.random(60);
}

But, i want to make it like Dark-Light.
Which emote is 2890, i changed the setAnimation to 2890 and the specGFX to 2890.
Still didn’t work!!

Please Help!! :o

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] Need Help Editing Special Attack Emotes!
